comments:
Drive: tptp.sdk-TPTP-4.2.0-200605090100. 

1.Select a single record in the symptom result view. [Must do this to reproduce it]
2.Open the preference dialog and click the node for 'symptom results views' to laod the 'Filtered Properties' tabbed pane.
3.Unchecked all properties then only check the "symptom created" or any property for Symptom Result View in the preference dilaog. Click OK or Apply buttons then the error message displayed.
